name: Queen's Rising Demo
description:
Queen's Rising is demo RPG about an amnesiac warlord and her quest to recover her memories and her throne.

This is a playable demo pre-release of the game created entirely during the timeframe of gbcompo21. The final game will be released as open-source.

In order to play this you need either a Gameboy Color emulator or a Gameboy Color with a flash cart.
